primitives.name: generation
primitives.description: Generates text based on a given prompt using a language model (LLM).

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: The input prompt for generating text.

primitives.name: function_calling
primitives.description: Calls a specified function with a given query and returns the result.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The input query for the function.

returns.description: The result of the function call.

primitives.name: write
primitives.description: Stores a key-value pair in the cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key for storing the value.

primitives.name: upsert
primitives.description: Stores a key-value pair in the semantic cache.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key for storing the value.

primitives.name: push
primitives.description: Pushes a value to a vector associated with a given key in the vec_storage.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key associated with the vector.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value to be pushed to the vector.

primitives.name: read
primitives.description: Searches for a value in the cache based on a given key.

returns.description: An optional reference to the value associated with the key.

primitives.name: search
primitives.description: Searches for values in the semantic cache based on a given query.

primitives.name: peek
primitives.description: Reads the last element of a vector associated with a given key in the vec_storage.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key associated with the vector.

returns.description: An optional reference to the last element of the vector.

primitives.name: pop
primitives.description: Removes and returns the last element of a vector associated with a given key in the vec_storage.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key associated with the vector.

primitives.name: check
primitives.description: Checks if a given result matches an expected value.

returns.description: True if the result matches the expected value, false otherwise.

primitives.name: fuzzy_check
primitives.description: Checks if a given result closely matches an expected value based on Levenshtein distance.

returns.description: True if the result closely matches the expected value, false otherwise.
